title: The Official 2020 Mock Draft With Danny Kelly | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Kevin Clark is joined by NFL draft guru Danny Kelly to dive into The Ringer’s final mock draft as we head into the 2020 NFL draft on Thursday night. Danny predicts how he thinks the first 17 picks will unfold and offers up some pre-draft superlatives.
Host: Kevin Clark
Guest: Danny Kelly

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
